turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Hawaiian, one anchovy black olive, one veggie, and one cream cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like bella lunas does not have anchovies nor do they have cream cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Then just two Hawaiians and two veggies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want thin crust for all four pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. so you said 4 medium pizzas, all with thin crust. 2 hawaiian pizzas and 2 veggie lovers pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need extra cheese on all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. extra cheese on all four pizzas. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 premium pizzas comes out to $72.34.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order, the pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.
